mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_activation_info(activation_id, activation_name, start_date, end_date, content, seeker_id) VALUES(user_activation_info_seq.NEXTVAL, #{activationName}, TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{content}, #{seekerId})
mapper.select: SELECT activation_name, TO_CHAR(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), content FROM user_activation_info WHERE activation_id=#{activationId}
